title: HeatSeekNYC and #ODSC present Hack for Heat
desc: Last winter, over 230,000 heating complaints were made to the city by tenants freezing in their homes ? by far the most common complaint to 311. Help us expose New York City?s heating crisis, by joining our free Hackathon. We will provide data, speakers, wifi, and food.?Participants need to bring their laptops, skills, and imaginations. Learn more at  http://hack.odsc.com
